turkish_example_sentence: Biz lezzetli sarı peyniri alsak, akşam yemeğimiz daha lezzetli olacak.
english_example_sentence: If we were to take the delicious yellow cheese, our dinner would be more delicious.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы взяли вкусный желтый сыр, наш ужин был бы вкуснее.
